text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS FX504GD-NH51 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Intel 8th Gen i5-8300H (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS FX504GD-NH51 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Intel 8th Gen i5-8300H (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The ASUS FX504GD-NH51 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Intel 8th Gen i5-8300H (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS FX504GD-NH51 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Intel 8th Gen i5-8300H (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the ASUS FX504GD-NH51 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Intel 8th Gen i5-8300H (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
